IRS990.Desc: HURRICANE HARVEY RECOVERY ASSISTANCE FOR LOUISIANA - DONATED 3,103 PACKS OF DISASTER RELIEF PRODUCTS THAT INCLUDE FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS, MEAL/SNACK BARS, SOY PROTEIN MIX, SPORTS DRINK MIX, MUSCLE PAIN CREAM AND CLEANING PRODUCTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: LESEA GLOBAL FEED THE HUNGRY - DONATED 3,493 UNITS OF SHAKLEE PHYSIQUE PURE RECOVERY SHAKE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: LA FIRES RECOVERY ASSISTANCE FOR SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA - DONATED 1,350 PACKS OF DISASTER RELIEF PRODUCTS THAT INCLUDE FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS, MEAL/SNACK BARS, SOY PROTEIN MIX, SPORTS DRINK MIX, MUSCLE PAIN CREAM AND CLEANING PRODUCTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING USE OF GRANT FUNDS SHAKLEE CARES BOARD MEMBERS REVIEW REQUESTS FOR DISASTER RELIEF PRODUCTS THAT ARE RECEIVED FROM THE COMMUNITY SUFFERING A DISASTER. THE BOARD MEMBERS REVIEW THE REQUESTS, AND ONCE APPROVED, THE DISASTER RELIEF PRODUCTS (NUTRITIONAL OR HOME PACKS, GERMICIDES, FIRST RESPONDER, ETC.) ARE SHIPPED FROM THE SHAKLEE WAREHOUSE IN OHIO TO THE REQUESTOR, WHO THEN MONITORS AND DISTRIBUTES THE PACKS DIRECTLY TO THE FAMILIES IN NEED. SCHEDULE I, PART II, LINE 1, COLUMN G NONCASH ASSISTANCE - 3,493 UNITS OF PHYSIQUE SHAKE

TYPE OF GRANT OR ASSISTANCE 1 - CASH, FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS AND CLEANING PRODUCTS FOR IMMEDIATE RELIEF FOR HURRICANE HARVEY VICTIMS IN TEXAS. 2 - FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS AND CLEANING PRODUCTS FOR IMMEDIATE RELIEF FOR HURRICANE IRMA VICTIMS IN FLORIDA. 3 - FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS AND CLEANING PRODUCTS FOR IMMEDIATE RELIEF FOR HURRICANE MARIA VICTIMS IN PUERTO RICO, MAINE AND CALIFORNIA. 4 - FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS AND CLEANING PRODUCTS FOR IMMEDIATE RELIEF FOR LA FIRES VICTIMS IN CALIFORNIA. 5 - FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS AND CLEANING PRODUCTS FOR IMMEDIATE RELIEF FOR FLOODING VICTIMS IN ILLINOIS. 6 - CLEANING PRODUCTS FOR IMMEDIATE RELIEF FOR WINTER STORM VICTIMS IN MEMPHIS, TENNESSEE. 7 - FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS FOR IMMEDIATE RELIEF FOR FIRE VICTIMS IN PASCO COUNTY, FLORIDA.

DESCRIPTION OF NON-CASH ASSISTANCE 1 - DISASTER RELIEF PACKS INCLUDING FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS, SOY PROTEIN MIX, SPORTS DRINK MIX, MUSCLE PAIN CREAM AND CLEANING PRODUCTS. 2 - DISASTER RELIEF PACKS INCLUDING FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS, SOY PROTEIN MIX, SPORTS DRINK MIX, MUSCLE PAIN CREAM AND CLEANING PRODUCTS. 3 - DISASTER RELIEF PACKS INCLUDING FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS, SOY PROTEIN MIX, SPORTS DRINK MIX, MUSCLE PAIN CREAM AND CLEANING PRODUCTS. 4 - DISASTER RELIEF PACKS INCLUDING FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS, SOY PROTEIN MIX, SPORTS DRINK MIX, MUSCLE PAIN CREAM AND CLEANING PRODUCTS. 5 - DISASTER RELIEF PACKS INCLUDING FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLMENTS, SOY PROTEIN MIX, SPORTS DRINK MIX, MUSCLE PAIN CREAM AND CLEANING PRODUCTS. 6 - DISASTER RELIEF PACKS INCLUDING CLEANING PRODUCTS. 7 - DISASTER RELIEF PACKS INCLUDING FOOD/DIETARY SUPPLEMENTS AND SPORTS DRINK PRODUCTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART I, LINE 1 & PART III, LINE 1
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ORGANIZATION'S MISSION THE PURPOSE OF THE CORPORATION IS TO RAISE AND DISTRIBUTE FUNDS AND GOODS EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE CHARITABLE PURPOSE OF HELPING INDEPENDENT DISTRIBUTORS OF SHAKLEE CORPORATION, ITS AFFILIATES AND SUBSIDIARIES ('SHAKLEE'), SHAKLEE EMPLOYEES AND THEIR COMMUNITIES IN TIMES OF HARDSHIP AND NEED, AND TO HELP ERADICATE OR REDUCE MALNUTRITION, PARTICULARLY IN DEVELOPING COUNTRIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ROGER BARNETT SERVES AS DIRECTOR AND PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OF SHAKLEE CARES AND IS PRESIDENT OF AN AFFILIATED COMPANY, SHAKLEE CORPORATION. MICHAEL BATESOLE IS DIRECTOR AND ASSISTANT SECRETARY OF THE BOARD OF SHAKLEE CARES AND IS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER OF AN AFFILIATED COMPANY, SHAKLEE CORPORATION. TODD TUCKER SERVES AS DIRECTOR AND SECRETARY OF THE BOARD OF SHAKLEE CARES AND IS SVP & GENERAL COUNSEL OF AN AFFILIATED COMPANY, SHAKLEE CORPORATION. SHABHNA ASTHANA IS TREASURER OF SHAKLEE CARES AND IS SVP FINANCE, CORPORATE CONTROLLER OF AN AFFILIATED COMPANY, SHAKLEE CORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 SUPPORTING WORK-PAPERS ARE PREPARED AND REVIEWED INTERNALLY THEN SENT TO AN EXTERNAL TAX ACCOUNTING FIRM FOR REVIEW AND PREPARATION OF THE FORM 990 RETURN. AFTER ANY PROPOSED ADJUSTMENTS, THE FORMS ARE REVIEWED BY STAFF AND MANAGEMENT, INCLUDING AN OFFICER OF THE ORGANIZATION. THE FINAL FORM 990 IS THEN REVIEWED BY THE BOARD. THE BOARD APPROVES THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING. THIS APPROVAL IS DOCUMENTED IN THE COMMITTEE MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION CURRENTLY FOLLOWS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY OF AN AFFILIATED ORGANIZATION, SHAKLEE CORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 13
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE A WRITTEN WHISTLEBLOWER POLICY DUE TO ITS SIZE AND NATURE OF ITS ACTIVITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
